casebody.data:
Arthur LAGUETTE, petitioner,
v.
U.S. BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as the Alleged Trustee of Specialty Underwriting and Residential Finance Trust, Mortgage Loan Asset-Backed Certificates, Series 2006-BC4, et al. No. 14-1370. Supreme Court of the United States June 29, 2015.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
